text:
@realDonaldTrump Retweeting these every day is obsessive, especially when far more serious issues are on your plate. 

Top issues remain:
1. The Russian bounty on American troops.
2. The spreading emergency from coronavirus.
3. The widespread protests against systemic racism and police brutality.
